mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.record_id AS "recordId", a.item_id AS "itemId", a.result_dict_id AS "resultDictId", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.examination_times AS "examinationTimes"
LEFT JOIN bj_examination_record b ON b.id = a.record_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_record_item( id, record_id, item_id, result_dict_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, examination_times ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{recordId}, #{itemId}, #{resultDictId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{examinationTimes} )
